unnormalised: Hey folks, any updates on Jadeja? Heard he tweaked his hamstring during the Ranji Trophy match on 12/01/2024. Is Bumrah back to full form after that stress fracture? Saw somewhere it was supposed to be 24/02/2024. Hope Ishant Sharma's ankle is doing better too! Any word from the NCA? Really hoping he's fit before the next series. Need him bowling those yorkers at 150 kmph! It's already 17:00 hrs. Come on, BCCI, spill the chai!
normalised: Hey folks, any updates on Jadeja? Heard he tweaked his hamstring during the Ranji Trophy match on twelfth January two thousand and twenty four. Is Bumrah back to full form after that stress fracture? Saw somewhere it was supposed to be twenty fourth February two thousand and twenty four. Hope Ishant Sharma's ankle is doing better too! Any word from the N C A? Really hoping he's fit before the next series. Need him bowling those yorkers at one hundred and fifty kilometer per hour! It's already five P M. Come on, B C C I, spill the chai!
